content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. It's great that you're doing your research and planning to check out the recliners in person. That's always the best way to get a feel for the comfort and quality of a piece of furniture.

And don't forget to take your time measuring your dining room carefully. It's better to double-check your measurements than to risk buying a table and chairs that don't fit comfortably in the space. Remember to consider the traffic flow and conversation areas you want to create in your dining room, too.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, good luck with your shopping and measuring, and I hope your dad loves his new recliner!
